entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
